meanings.sent1: The bespectacled librarian helped me find a book.
meanings.sent2: She looked studious and smart in her bespectacled appearance.
meanings.sent3: The bespectacled cat tried on different pairs of glasses for fun.
meanings.sent4: His bespectacled eyes revealed a world of knowledge beyond the lenses.
meanings.sent5: The bespectacled scientist peered through the microscope with precision.

meanings.sent1: The bespectacled robot had sensors in its glasses.
meanings.sent2: The bespectacled knight rode into battle with confidence.
meanings.sent3: The bespectacled clown juggled while balancing glasses on his nose.
meanings.sent4: Her bespectacled gaze seemed to see through walls and into the future.
meanings.sent5: The bespectacled detective solved the mystery using his keen observation skills.
